data.eml:eml: Physoschistura harkishorei, a new species of loach from Arunachal Pradesh, north-eastern India (Teleostei: Nemacheilidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Das, Debangshu Narayan, Darshan, Achom (2017): Physoschistura harkishorei, a new species of loach from Arunachal Pradesh, north-eastern India (Teleostei: Nemacheilidae). Zootaxa 4337 (3): 403-412, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4337.3.5
